metrohm.omnis

Class OmnisSystemAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Object>
      • metrohm.omnis.OmnisSystemAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConnectionFinished, IOmnisSystem

    public class OmnisSystemAdapter
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Object>
implements IOmnisSystem, IConnectionFinished
    An adapter class, which provides all information from the MDP library which is used to display in the app.
